title: Senior Software Engineer - Engg
jobDescription:
Overview

GEP is a diverse, creative team of people passionate about procurement. We invest ourselves entirely in our client’s success, creating strong collaborative relationships that deliver extraordinary value year after year. Our clients include market global leaders with far-flung international operations, Fortune 500 and Global 2000 enterprises, leading government and public institutions. 

 

We deliver practical, effective services and software that enable procurement leaders to maximise their impact on business operations, strategy and financial performance. That’s just some of the things that we do in our quest to build a beautiful company, enjoy the journey and make a difference. GEP is a place where individuality is prized, and talent respected. We’re focused on what is real and effective. GEP is where good ideas and great people are recognized, results matter, and ability and hard work drive achievements. We’re a learning organization, actively looking for people to help shape, grow and continually improve us.

 

Are you one of us?

 

GEP is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, color, national origin, religion, sex, disability status, or any other characteristics protected by law. We are committed to hiring and valuing a global diverse work team.

 

For more information please visit us on GEP.com or check us out on LinkedIn.com.

Responsibilities
  • Interaction with individual product teams, engineering teams to understand the product features and purpose of implementation
  • Interact with customer to understand and triage technical issues
  • Play a technical role in customer support team to triage and work in liaison with multiple development teams to fix the issues
  • Come-up with proof of concepts as requested
  • Troubleshooting issues across environments
  • Responsible for monitoring, optimizing and performance tuning
  • Categorizing and prioritizing requests to ensure that adverse impact to business operations is minimized and normal service is restored quickly
  • Conceptualize, Design and Implement modules with individual products
  • Assisting in the achievement of Operational Excellence objectives for overall system reliability, security, availability, responsiveness, effectiveness, and operational cost
  • Participating in project implementation or modification/enhancements.
  • Able to work flexible hours, especially during product launches and post prod launch support when required
  • Working with global teams and technology partners and providing services to our internal/external customers
Qualifications
  • Candidate should possess a minimum of 5 years of prior experience in software development processes as an end-to-end developer.
  • Experience in technologies - ASP.Net, C#, WCF/Web API, MVC Framework, Java Script, jQuery.
  • Working experience on Angular2/4/5/6/7/8
  • Experience in developing web applications using MVC framework.
  • Excellent knowledge of Relational Database [SQL]and Non-Relational DB [Mongo] should be able to troubleshoot single-handedly.
  • Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
  • Familiarity with continuous integration
  • Document and maintain software functionality.
  • Experience working with Multi–threaded applications.
  • Understanding BPM tools [e.g. Camunda] will be very helpful.
  • Working experience on Azure Cloud-based application (preferred)

title: Lead IT Security
tagsAndSkills: Cyber Security,Compliance,Policy Formulation,Risk Management,IT Security,Strategy Development,Security,Cyber

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Role Description


Design, implement, and maintain robust security architectures for networks, systems, and applications. Ensure that security controls are integrated into all aspects of IT infrastructure.

Role Title


Lead IT Security

Role Summary


As a Lead IT Security professional, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing all aspects of the organization's information security program. You will play a pivotal role in safeguarding the organization's assets, data, and systems against potential threats and vulnerabilities. This position requires strong leadership skills, technical expertise, and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Working with


CIO and CISO

What the role entails Key accountabilities/ responsibilities


  • Strategy Development: Develop and implement a comprehensive IT security strategy aligned with organizational goals and industry best practices.
  • Risk Management: Identify, assess, and mitigate information security risks across the organization. Develop risk mitigation strategies and ensure their timely implementation.
  • Security Architecture: Design, implement, and maintain robust security architectures for networks, systems, and applications. Ensure that security controls are integrated into all aspects of IT infrastructure.
  • Security Operations: Oversee day-to-day security operations, including monitoring, incident response, and vulnerability management. Coordinate with internal teams and external vendors to address security incidents promptly.
  • Compliance: Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001). Conduct regular audits and assessments to assess compliance levels and implement corrective actions as necessary.
  • Security Awareness: Develop and deliver security awareness training programs for employees. Promote a culture of security awareness and best practices throughout the organization.
  • Security Testing: Conduct regular security testing, including penetration testing and vulnerability scanning, to identify and remediate weaknesses in the IT environment.
  • Incident Response: Lead the incident response process in the event of security breaches or incidents. Coordinate with internal teams and external stakeholders to contain incidents and minimize impact.
  • Vendor Management: Manage relationships with third-party security vendors and service providers. Evaluate vendor security practices and ensure compliance with contractual security requirements.
  • Team Leadership: Provide leadership and guidance to the IT security team. Set performance goals, conduct regular performance evaluations, and provide coaching and mentoring to team members.

What we are looking for in you


overseeing and managing all aspects of the organization's information security program

What we promise to you


Great learning opportunity

Role Demands (travel)


Mumbai

Location


Mumbai

Requirement


Essential


Desirable

Education


  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Advanced degree or relevant certifications (e.g., CISSP, CISM, CISA) preferred.
  • Proven experience (X years) in IT security roles, with a track record of progressively increasing responsibility.
  • Deep understanding of information security principles, practices, and technologies.
  • Experience with security frameworks and standards (e.g., NIST Cybersecurity Framework, CIS Controls).

Experience


  • 7-10 Years minimum IT Security Vertical

Stakeholder interfaces


Across Regions

title: Associate-Governance - Mumbai
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

  1. Managing complete life cycle of vendor management from onboarding of vendor, ongoing evaluation, and discontinuation of contract.
  2. DCA Agent ID creating and deletion tracking
  3. Managing vendor billing and clearance of invoices within stipulated timelines.
  4. Cost management of vendor for Collections.
  5. Daily and monthly Payment reconciliation on the cash collected through vendors and ensuring the deposition is done within TAT.
  6. Managing customer complaints regarding collection issues, process, resolve client discrepancies and payment issue and resolve within TAT.
  7. Monitoring vendor performance daily and ensuring coverage on all allocated accounts to vendor. Ensuring 100% allocation of delinquent accounts to vendors.
  8. Setting up the process and governance unit for the Collection unit with a focus on ensuring key vendor outsourcing risks and processes associated with the collection functions are monitored.
  9. Training of all outsourced agencies and call centers associated with the collection process.
  10. Monitoring the onboarding of agents with respect to the ID creation, ensuring relevant documents uploaded in system.
  11. Managing settlement process in line with the approved policy.
  12. Ensuring call evaluation process is followed on monthly basis and feedback communicated to the vendors.
  13. Monthly site visits to be conducted on vendors and perform audit basis the approved checklist.
  14. Ensuring monthly SLA of vendor are completed and uploaded on GRC before the deadlines.
  15. Handling all compliance and audit related actionable for the Collection unit including adherence to all regulatory framework guidelines and ensuring implementation of directions from time to time.
  16. Conducting quarterly QC on the process and activities identified for review and highlighting to senior management for any miss/gaps.

title: Opening For MES Engineer - Mumbai Location

placeholders.label: Hybrid - Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai

jobDescription:
Greetings!!


We are hiring for a MES Engineer at Mumbai Location.


Responsibilities:


  • Interface with clients to understand the requirements and gap analysis of customer requirements.
  • Define MES Solution Architecture and developing Detailed Design Specification.
  • Define Functional requirements through client interviews, documents reviews and workflow process mapping.
  • Contribute and lead MES implementation
  • Responsible for technical deliverables during the MES project life cycle
  • Actively participate in project team meeting and reviews with customer
  • Preparing weekly / Monthly reporting and sharing with customers
  • Assist customer in understanding and solving the technical challenges
  • Should be possible to estimate the efforts of MES implementation and working with sales to explain MES solutions to customers
  • Capable to integrate MES systems with OT systems like any DCS, PLC, SCADA and IT systems like ERP, AVEVA Pi systems etc.
  • Be capable of proposing or building prototype systems to demonstrate solutions.
  • Should be capable to work with OPC server and Client technologies
  • Communicate directly with customer about complex technical issues
  • Project control functions to be documented according to formats specified in standard templates (FDS) or by the Project Lead.
  • Actively participates in project meetings, site visits and/or startups.
  • Shall be able to troubleshoot the control and communication problems between different systems during FAT and at site.
  • Willing to travel for site commissioning activities depending upon the project requirements.
  • Compiles and maintains project databases, configuration data, or other project information.

Educational Qualification / Requirements:


  • Must be a Graduate in Engineering Disciplines Computer Science, Electronics & Instrumentation, Control & Instrumentation with minimum 2 to 5 years of relevant experience.
  • Should have good communication skills.
  • Attitude to Works effectively as individual & in team environment and shall be able to handle multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Experience in any MES implementation is must .
  • Experience in SQL programming and databases, ERP integration.
  • Experience with IT environment in networking and communication.
  • Experience in Python or any SW programming is preferable. Preferred AVEVA Certification in ASP, MES, Work Task, OSI PI.
  • Experience in OPC server architecture, experience in WEB API, REST API, MQTT protocol is preferable.

If you are interested, kindly share your updated resume to komala.palanisamy@non.se.com

title: IOS-Flutter App Developer
jobDescription:
Contribute to all phases of the development lifecycle concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to app stores, and support. diagnose performance issues, fix bugs, including crashes, to increase the functionality of the application

  • write well-designed, testable, efficient code ensure designs are in compliance with specifications prepare and produce releases of software components support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies and presenting these for architectural review

  • A strong commitment to quality and willingness to learn.

  • Design and Build sophisticated and highly scalable apps.

  • Use CI/CD for smooth deployment.

  • Manage the code and project on Git in order to keep in sync with other team members and managers.

  • Communicate with the Project Manager regarding the status of projects and suggest appropriate deadlines for new functionalities.

  • Ensure security guidelines are always followed while developing the app.

  • Maintaining software through the product lifecycle, including design, development, verification, and bug fixes.

Connect regularly with the Quality Assurance Specialist to deliver a stable app.

Requirements

  • Experience required- 2 - 5 years

  • Proven experience as an app developer.

  • Proficient in Objective-C, Swift, and Cocoa Touch.

  • Extensive experience with iOS Frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation.

  • Knowledge of iOS back-end services.

  • Knowledge of Apple s design principles and application interface guidelines.

  • Proficient in code versioning tools, including Mercurial, Git, and SVN.

  • Knowledge of C-based libraries.

  • Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.

  • Experience with continuous integration.

  • knowledge and expertise in flutter framework and dart programming

  • hands-on experience in designing and developing micro-services architecture and containers

  • object-oriented analysis, UML, and design using common design patterns.

  • Hands-on experience in development ide Xcode-studio, Visual studio, firebase test lab

  • Familiarity with push notifications

  • Familiarity with ios integration with flutter

  • Complete understanding of SDLC

  • Experience with agile development

  • Experience with material design and android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices

  • Good knowledge of adding third-party libraries

  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements

  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies a track record of delivering successful complex consumer product apps critical thinker

  • Have published one or more mobile apps in Google Play or App Store.

  • In-depth knowledge and understanding of Firebase

  • Be proficient in version control and continuous integration with tools such as Bit Bucket, Git, and Jenkins.

  • Good communication skills.

title: Progressive Web App Developer
jobDescription:
1. Front End Developer with experience in developing Progressive Web Applications for Mobile and Desktop.
2. Understanding of Service Workers configuration.
3.Experience with Single Page Apps.At least 2 year experience of Web Application development with Angular, HTML5, CSS, JS.
4. Understanding of secure development best practices for Web Applications (i.e. XSS, CORS, cookie, local storage, etc.)
5. Experience in developing for compatibility with multiple browsers: Chrome, FF, Edge, Safari. Familiarity with iOS vs Android web application advantages and limitations.
6. Understanding of OIDC authentication patterns (Auth Code, Implicit).
7. Familiarity with AWS API Gateway and AppSync SDKs is a plus.
8. Experience with GraphQL, REST, and RealTime/WebSocket APIs.
9. Ability to independently troubleshoot and resolve issues of work environment and code.
10. Experience working as a developer in a scrum team.
11. Understanding of Angular web application best practices and design patterns.
12. Familiarity with static web application hosting on S3/CloudFront a plus.
13. Familiarity with AWS console a plus.
14. Experience working with GIT repository.
15. Familiarity with TFS on GIT a plus.
